inferredPurpose: Retrieves the number of upcoming or active events for a specific sport (e.g., 10800).
Fetches AI-generated match insights or summaries for a specific event in the given language.
Gets a chronological list of key events (goals, cards, substitutions) for a match.
Retrieves the recent form (e.g., last 5/6 results) for both teams before the match.
Gets the head-to-head historical record between the two competing teams.
Fetches information about the managers/coaches of the two teams for the event.
Lists the TV channels broadcasting the event in a specific country.
